text: Voistynu, dlya viddanykh [Allahu] — cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya viruyuchykh – cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya smyrennykh — cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya pravdyvykh – cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya terplyachykh — cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya pokirnykh – cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya tykh, yaki trymayutʹ pist — cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya tykh, yaki zakryvayutʹ svoyu nahotu — cholovikiv i zhinok, dlya tykh, yaki chasto z·haduyutʹ Allaha — cholovikiv i zhinok — usim Allah pryhotuvav proshchennya ta velyku vynahorodu
